name: Overthrowing the Network State with Coordi-Nations
description:
ZUZALU HYPERSTITION:

09:30 - 11:00 Reporting on the Zuzalu Experimentation: Success & challenges; Lesson learned and insights

11:00 - 12:30 Panel with audience participation (fish-bowl format):

  • How do we replicate / scale the experiment ?
  • Upcoming strategic opportunities to experiment, share, and advance our Coordi-Nation’s goals.

14:00 - 17:00 Roundtables

  1. What’s a good hyperstition / lore for Coordi-Nations ?
  2. Alternative memes, along with strategies & tactics for memetic warfare against the Network State.
